item.description:
It's time to gather the girls together for a “design-your-own handbag” party! Pick your fabric and style for a custom reversible knitting bag.

Any guest who books a party of their own while attending another party will get the amount they spent at their friend's party back at their party, plus the usual 10% of sales, to spend on merchandise.

All custom orders are returned in about three weeks to the hostess. She will then distribute them to the guests. Shipping is available at a cost of 10% per order. We use the USPS Priority Mail service.
item.name: Design-Your-Own Handbag Party!
